name: Color Rings Puzzle Glow
description:
Color Glow Puzzle is a simple and addictive colourful puzzle game.
Match the correct color ring in the line. Very addictive and time-delivering game.

Easy to play and enjoyable game for all ages. Freedom forever!
Complete puzzling ring challenges and get the highest possible score.

HOW TO PLAY

> Simply drag the rings available below and put them into the grid.
> Remove the rings by making horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line having the same color.
> You can undo the rings you just dragged and dropped by using restore button.
> Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get higher score!
>You can also try multiple shapes having a variety of colors!

FEATURES OF Glow Rings 2d Puzzle Color Game:

* YES! Its 100% free game to play.
* Beautiful color rings and art style.
* Restore button will restore moves.
* Very smooth touch control for this free puzzle game.
* No Wifi: Play offline.
* Less Ads are shown.
* Ads can be fully removed in a very cheap price.
Enjoy the game !!!
